com.github.cassidyjames.principles.desktop CC0 GPL-3.0+ Principles Remember Dieter Rams' ten principles of good design
According to Dieter Rams, good design is innovative, makes a product useful, is aesthetic, makes a product understandable, is unobtrusive, is honest, is long-lasting, is thorough down to the last detail, is environmentally-friendly, and is as little design as possible.
Get a simple reminder of one of these principles each time you open the app.
Choose between a light or dark style
Applet stays on the bottom on all workspaces
Automatically goes transparent when not focused
Set to automatically start in System Settings → Applications → Startup
